text: okay today we are making a chocolate cake so we have a large bowl now here we are going to add 240 grams of all-purpose flour after that we're gonna add 200 grams of sugar and then 500 grams of cocoa powder and then one and a half tablespoons of baking soda baking soda and then we add some add a teaspoon of kosher salt then we sift the mixed powder and mix it with a whisk now it's a wet ingredients so we can put some half cup of vegetable oil and one cup of whole milk and one teaspoon of vanilla extract and two large eggs room-temperature mix the wet ingredient well and then we can add the wet ingredient into the dry ingredient then we whisk it until it's well combined after it's mixed we can add some chocolate add some chocolate chips in there okay talks about we also add a cup of hot water okay before we add the chocolate chips and after that we can add say half a cup of chocolate chips everything is ready now we can put it into the pans after we put the batter in the pans we put the pans in the preheated oven the oven was preheated to 175 degrees now put the pans into the oven and let it heat for 35 minutes after that the chocolate cake is ready
